title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the NeurofeedbackPerformanceOptimizer system.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall architecture of the NeurofeedbackPerformanceOptimizer system, including components, interfaces, and data flow.

title: Database Design
description: Design the database schema and data models for storing user data, performance metrics, and neurofeedback data.

title: User Interface Design
description: Design the user interface for the NeurofeedbackPerformanceOptimizer system, including wireframes and mockups.

title: Neurofeedback Data Processing
description: Design and implement algorithms for processing and analyzing neurofeedback data to provide performance insights.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Evaluate security and privacy requirements for handling sensitive user data and neurofeedback information.
